    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    movie_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    rating FLOAT,

    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE MovieMetadata (movie_id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, genre VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, release_year INT, duration_minutes INT, rating FLOAT)

CREATE TABLE UserRatings (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, movie_id INT, rating FLOAT, timestamp TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE UserAccounts (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL, join_date DATE, last_login TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE Watchlist (watchlist_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, movie_id INT, added_date DATE)
